value.title: How to configure VPN integration in Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics
value.excerpt: Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics (ATA) helps members of Security Operation Centers gain a valuable insight into the security of their Active Directory environment. In this video we will discuss how to integrate VPN (virtual private network) connection events to Advanced Threat Analytics.   For more
